title: How long to gain Honor levels?
body: Hello, a couple weeks ago i came back from a 2 week ban and in that time ive played nearly everyday and have not even hit level 1 honor from 0. I was wondering how long the process would be for me to reach level 1 from 0 and if the honor resets after seasons

replies.body:
*[There isn't a set time.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ) As long as you play consistently without any toxic behaviors you will eventually get back up to level 1+.*
 My advice would to be not to focus on the "grind" to higher honor levels but to actually work on improving your behavior and mentality so that you don't find yourself in this predicament again. If you only focus on grinding you are going to get frustrated when it doesn't happen as fast as you want it to. 

As for honor resets, i'm not sure.

I had a 2 week suspension myself which, although surprising at first, did make me focus on my behaviour and approach to games. 

Nevertheless, despite the behaviour change, it took over a month of solid playing to hit level 1. Getting to level 2 went more swiftly, maybe a fortnight or so.

However, I agree with and echo Yaiamone's sentiments:
> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Gh13v2vQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T23:18:12.737+0000)
> My advice would to be not to focus on the "grind" to higher honor levels but to actually work on improving your behavior and mentality so that you don't find yourself in this predicament again.

Let my post serve as reassurance that with a positive approach and focus on being a good summoner to the community you will get your honor back. And it'll be a pleasant surprise when it happens.
